name: 7a-projects-sitruna
description: A modular React-based application for dynamic content integration through declarative module configuration.

scripts.build: npm run copy-content && vite build --mode production --base=./
scripts.postbuild: node --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning scripts/prepare_deploy.js && node --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning scripts/fix-github-pages.js && node --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning scripts/github-pages-setup.js
scripts.predeploy: npm run update-content && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.deploy-full: npm run update-content && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && gh-pages -d dist
